text: B324 (also known as [HS80] B324) is an A-type supergiant star located 2.7 million light years away in the Triangulum Galaxy. It has a radius of 484-642 solar radii, a luminosity of 863,000-875,000 solar luminosities, and a temperature of 6,970-8,000 kelvin. ==References== Category:Stars
title: B324
